abstract: Two home improvement bazaars reported earnings that may reflect a turning point in the economy.
snippet: Two home improvement bazaars reported earnings that may reflect a turning point in the economy.
lead_paragraph: After more than a year of not spending money on their homes, consumers began refurbishing their kitchens and painting their living rooms in what appears to be the early stages of a comeback for the home improvement industry.

headline.main: Home Improvement Retailers See Glints of Rebound
headline.print_headline: Home Improvement Retailers See Glints of Rebound
